name: Pipe Runner 2048
description:
Pipe Runner 2048 is a VR plumbing technician training game designed to educate military personnel on plumbing-basics for a broad range of vehicle applications. By playing Pipe Runner 2048, personnel can be trained on basic tasks and hardware encountered in all types of low and high-pressure plumbing feed applications, including submarine, jet-fighters, and launch and space vehicles.
